articles.title: Photo scroll: Blizzard whips across Mass. with heavy snow, high winds
articles.description:
A massive snowstorm pummeled the Northeast on Monday, with meteorologists predicting over 2 feet of snow in some areas.

articles.title: Market Basket stores in Mass. close early Monday due to the blizzard
articles.description:
The grocery chain closed the majority of its stores early, citing “the severe weather today, and for the safety of our associates and customers.”

articles.title: Did you have to go into work during the blizzard?
articles.description:

articles.title: Mass. plow driver survives near-impalement when tree limb crashes through truck windshield
